name: Evil Money
description:
One day a simple man found out that his PC was stolen... Right behind his back. There was a little note from the thief: "If you want to see your pc again - bring 1.000.000". We don't know, why this PC was so important to him. Maybe there were some bitcoins. But we know that this man will do anything to bring his treasure back.

Will he be able to save his PC within one week? Will see.




Controls
  • WASD -- movement
  • LMB -- throw money
  • ESC (hold) -- main menu
  • R (hold) -- quick level restart
What to do?

You have 7 days to collect $1M. Rest is up to you!
